column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I love this place
column3: tasty food and good prices. If you think it's only ramen noodles (which btw are served in a lot of varieties) think again
column4: because it offers a solid variety of appetizers
column5: bowls and desserts. Personal favorite is the Jinya bun. Be ready to wait maybe 10 to 15 minutes cuz it's busy most of the time.
